mapper.sql: a.ID as "id" , a.RY_ID as "ryId" , a.XM as "xm" , a.ZGBH as "zgbh" , a.GQPX_FS as "gqpxFs" , a.JNCS_FS as "jncsFs" , a.PTH_DJ as "pthDj" , a.TJ_ZG as "tjZg" , a.ZGZ_BH as "zgzBh" , a.REMARKS as "remarks" , a.ENABLE_FLAG as "enableFlag" , a.DEL_FLAG as "delFlag" , a.CREATE_BY as "createBy" , a.CREATE_DATE as "createDate" , a.UPDATE_BY as "updateBy" , a.UPDATE_DATE as "updateDate"
mapper.select:
SELECT count(1) FROM t_px_jszgz a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_px_jszgz( ID , RY_ID , XM , ZGBH , GQPX_FS , JNCS_FS , PTH_DJ , TJ_ZG , ZGZ_BH , REMARKS , ENABLE_FLAG , DEL_FLAG , CREATE_BY , CREATE_DATE , UPDATE_BY , UPDATE_DATE ) values( #{id} , #{ryId} , #{xm} , #{zgbh} , #{gqpxFs} , #{jncsFs} , #{pthDj} , #{tjZg} , #{zgzBh} , #{remarks} , #{enableFlag} , #{delFlag} , #{createBy} , #{createDate} , #{updateBy} , #{updateDate} )
